A decent game to play, sadly after the transition to f2p hacking has taken over.

Still a toxic community, still feels like you sometimes get paired with smurfs. Cheaters seem a lot less prevalent than before though, but I am 99% that's due to the relatively recent free to play model implemented(non prime) where the vast majority of cheaters seem to have moved. 

It's good for a competitive fps, the mechanics are simple yet hard to master.  Would I recommend it though? It's a very soft yes for me, but then again I do take multi-month breaks from the game.

Завела многих друзей - только никто со мной из них играть не хочет.
